biotools.summary: It evaluates the pathogenic potential of DNA sequence alterations. It is designed to predict the functional consequences of amino acid substitutions as well as intronic and synonymous alterations, short insertion and/or deletion mutations and variants spanning intron-exon borders.

bioschemas.name: MutationTaster
